title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What does Joey want to see in the New York Times?
questions.correct_answer: The comics
questions.explanation: Joey asks Chandler 'Can I see the comics?' when Chandler is reading the New York Times.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's yelling at Rachel, according to Joey?
options: Because she didn't forgive him for sleeping with someone else
Because she borrowed his moisturizer without asking
Because she didn't want to go to the game with him
questions.correct_answer: Because she didn't forgive him for sleeping with someone else
questions.explanation: Joey explains that Ross yells at Rachel because he thinks she should have forgiven him by now for sleeping with someone else.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is Phoebe's dream about Ross and Rachel?
options: That they get back together and have a baby
That they never broke up and are still happy together
That they are in a fight and never speak to each other again
That they are married and living in Paris
questions.correct_answer: That they never broke up and are still happy together
questions.explanation: Phoebe shares her dream where Ross and Rachel never broke up and are still happy together.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What event is Ross planning for the weekend?
options: A laser disc marathon and dart tournament
questions.correct_answer: A laser disc marathon and dart tournament
questions.explanation: Ross plans a laser disc marathon and dart tournament for the weekend.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: Why does Rachel decline Ross's invitation to stay for dinner at Carol's place?
options: Because she doesn't want to see Ross
Because she is allergic to the food
questions.correct_answer: None of the above, it's not Rachel, it's Ross who is at Carol's place
questions.explanation: The scene shows Ross at Carol's place, not Rachel.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's car breaking down?
questions.correct_answer: It ran out of gas
questions.explanation: Phoebe's car breaks down because it runs out of gas.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is Rachel's rule about using public restrooms?
options: Always bring your own toilet paper
questions.correct_answer: No tissue, no tuschy
questions.explanation: Rachel shares her rule 'no tissue, no tuschy' when discussing public restrooms.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: Why does Joey try to make a sign at the rest stop?
questions.correct_answer: To ask for help
questions.explanation: Joey makes a sign that says 'help' spelled backwards so helicopters can read it.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's initial reluctance to pick up his friends?
options: He doesn't want to see Rachel
He is busy with other plans
He is not a good driver
questions.correct_answer: He doesn't want to see Rachel
questions.explanation: Ross is initially reluctant to pick up his friends because he doesn't want to see Rachel.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Ross and Rachel to stop their fighting?
options: You need to forgive each other
You don't have to love each other, but please stop fighting
You should take a break from each other
questions.correct_answer: You don't have to love each other, but please stop fighting
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Ross and Rachel that they don't have to love each other, but they should stop fighting.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is Chandler's middle name?
questions.correct_answer: Handle
questions.explanation: Chandler jokingly says that 'handle' is his middle name.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: Why does Ross go to Carol's house?
questions.correct_answer: To look for a videotape
questions.explanation: Ross goes to Carol's house to look for a videotape that is half an episode of M*A*S*H and half the hostages coming home.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is the name of the route that Phoebe is trying to determine?
questions.correct_answer: Route 27
questions.explanation: Phoebe is trying to determine if they are on Route 27, but it is later revealed that there is no Route 27.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What does Joey use to try to open the locked cab?
questions.correct_answer: A bra underwire
questions.explanation: Joey uses Phoebe's bra underwire to try to open the locked cab.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: Why does Chandler start smoking again?
options: Because he is stressed about Ross and Rachel's breakup
Because he is trying to quit chewing gum
questions.correct_answer: Because his parents got divorced
questions.explanation: Chandler starts smoking again because it reminds him of when his parents got divorced, which is when he first started smoking.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica, Rachel, and Phoebe's argument over whose bra to use to open the cab?
options: They don't want to ruin their bras
They don't think it will work
They are arguing over who has the biggest breasts
They are arguing over who has the smallest breasts
questions.correct_answer: They are arguing over who has the biggest breasts
questions.explanation: The girls argue over whose bra to use because Joey thinks the person with the biggest breasts will have the biggest bra and therefore the biggest underwire.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she asks him why he wants to come skiing with them?
options: Because I want to spend time with you
Because I want to prove a point
Because I'm a horrible skier and I want to embarrass myself
questions.correct_answer: Because I'm a horrible skier and I want to embarrass myself
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Oh-oh, hitting me where it hurts, my ski skills' when Rachel asks him why he wants to come skiing.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What is the outcome of Phoebe's call to the motor club?
options: They send someone to tow the cab
They give her directions to the nearest gas station
They tell her that they can't help her
They send someone to bring her gas
questions.correct_answer: They tell her that they can't help her
questions.explanation: Phoebe calls the motor club, but they are unable to help her because she doesn't know the exact location of the rest stop.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: Why does Carol give Ross her car keys?
options: So he can drive to the store
So he can pick up his friends
So he can go to the movies
So he can drive to work
questions.correct_answer: So he can pick up his friends
questions.explanation: Carol gives Ross her car keys so he can pick up his friends who are stranded at the rest stop.

topic.title: The One Without The Ski Trip

questions.question: What does Chandler do to try to stop Ross and Rachel's fighting?
options: He yells at them to stop
He tries to reason with them
questions.correct_answer: He dances around them
questions.explanation: Chandler tries to stop Ross and Rachel's fighting by dancing around them.
